hero_subtitle:
Hi, how are you? My name is Kimberly and I'm a technical writerMy ideal work environment encourages creativity and collaboration, and provides plenty of opportunities for growth. It would allow room for self-improvement, value hard work, and uphold a fair work-life balance.
​Roller derby enthusiast. Japanese culture nerd. Foodie. Gamer. Devourer of novels. Lover of all things cute.​
